page.title: 01LONG MYND
page.content: The{Long Mynd}is mainly covered with bracken and moss,parts of it are grass in some places there are bare rocks.It is all hilly and mountainous.There are sheep running over the Long Mynd in the summer and there is the odd farm or two scattered around,but the Long Mynd is mostly used as a{tourist } attraction.There is a{reservoir}in one of the valleys in the Long Mynd which used to give water to Church Stretton. There are not many roads and most of them are not very wide or well built. Most of the Long Mynd is owned by the {National Trust}the Long Mynd is situated near Church Stretton.
